title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: Harry Potter discovers he is a wizard and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, beginning his magical journey.

title: The Hobbit
description: Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit, is swept into a quest to reclaim a treasure guarded by a dragon named Smaug.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: Elizabeth Bennet navigates issues of manners, morality, and love in 19th century England.

title: The Great Gatsby
description: A mysterious millionaire, Jay Gatsby, tries to win back his former lover Daisy in the Roaring Twenties.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: Scout Finch grows up in the racially charged American South and learns about justice and compassion.
A dystopian future where the government watches everything and controls even people's thoughts.

title: Moby-Dick
description: Captain Ahab seeks revenge against the white whale Moby Dick, leading to a tragic journey.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
description: Holden Caulfield, a teenager in New York, struggles with alienation and identity.

title: The Alchemist
description: A young shepherd travels from Spain to Egypt after dreaming of finding treasure in the pyramids.

title: Little Women
description: The four March sisters experience love, loss, and family during the American Civil War.
